
=head1 NAME

article

=head1 DESCRIPTION



=head1 FIELDS

 id (serial) - 
 short_name (character varying) - 
 title (character varying(256)) - 
 doi (character varying(64)) - 
 year (integer) - 
 journal_id (integer) - 
 journal_vol (character varying(32)) - 
 journal_pages (character varying(32)) - 
 url (character varying(128)) - 
 notes (character varying(1024)) - 


=head1 SCHEMA

                                                      Table "gcis_metadata.article"
     Column     |          Type           |                      Modifiers                       | Storage  | Stats target | Description 
 ---------------+-------------------------+------------------------------------------------------+----------+--------------+-------------
  id            | integer                 | not null default nextval('article_id_seq'::regclass) | plain    |              | 
  short_name    | character varying       |                                                      | extended |              | 
  title         | character varying(256)  |                                                      | extended |              | 
  doi           | character varying(64)   |                                                      | extended |              | 
  year          | integer                 |                                                      | plain    |              | 
  journal_id    | integer                 |                                                      | plain    |              | 
  journal_vol   | character varying(32)   |                                                      | extended |              | 
  journal_pages | character varying(32)   |                                                      | extended |              | 
  url           | character varying(128)  |                                                      | extended |              | 
  notes         | character varying(1024) |                                                      | extended |              | 
 Indexes:
     "article_pkey" PRIMARY KEY, btree (id)
 Foreign-key constraints:
     "article_ibfk_1" FOREIGN KEY (journal_id) REFERENCES journal(id) MATCH FULL
 Has OIDs: no
 

=cut
